page.title:
92 Guidance - Chronic studies
92 Guidance - Chronic studies
page.normal_text:
The focus of the multiple-dose studies of more than 2 to 3 days in duration is to provide documentation of “clinical acceptability” and safety of the test drug rather than providing pivotal proof of efficacy.
The focus of the multiple-dose studies of
more than 2 to 3 days in duration is to
provide documentation of “clinical
acceptability” and safety of the test drug
rather than providing pivotal proof of
efficacy.
